name: A Human Haunting!
description:
A hidden object game where a ghost looks for signs of a human haunting!

Credits:
Brooklyn Chen - Programmer, Animator
Captain Turnip - Artist

Music & SFX by Various OpenGameArt.org Contributors:
Peachtea@You're Perfect Studio, bart, syncopika, dklon, ViRiX (soundcloud.com/virix), Kenney.nl, wobbleboxx.com, Iwan 'qubodup' Gabovitch, LeeZH, KillaMaaki
